title: ISic003694. I.Sicily inscription 003694
body:
Facsimile Images

1[---]Ν
2[---]ΤΙΟ[---]

Apparatus criticus

  • Text after Orsi 1899

translation

commentary

ISic003376 (inv.19047) and ISic003375 (inv.19048) are from the same tomb and listed in the museum inventory; however this third fragment does not appear in the inventory and has not been commented on subsequently.

bibliography

  • Orsi NSA 1899 411 frag.b https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001392
  • Agostiniani and Scerra 2017 336-337 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002807
  • Agostiniani Forthcoming https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002519
